data.title: Electric Go Karting Sydney - Hyper Karting Moore Park
data.meta_description: Discover electric go karts and Virtual Reality games at Hyper Karting Moore Park Sydney. Experience a massive karting track and Australia's first VR arcade. The ultimate electric go kart & VR experience in Sydney. Corporate bookings available. Book your next perfect venue with us!
data.text:
Fast electric go karts

Undeniably fast, instant torque karts imported from Germany, our RiMO electric karts are brand new, cutting-edge and reach their top speeds faster than ever — so buckle your seatbelts! Enjoy an overall smooth racing experience thanks to our karts’ high-tech handling abilities and evenly-distributed battery weight. Keep an eye on your opposition with live racer stats throughout the race. But what we are most proud of is that racing with us is clean and safe. Our electric go karts are environmentally friendly and don’t emit any fumes or emissions.

Speedy fun for everyone

You don’t have to be an F1 racer to enjoy yourself at Hyper Karting, our venue is suitable for all ages and experience levels. The Main Track is open to drivers over 140cm tall, while our purpose-built Mini Track is suited for young speedsters aged 3-7. To ensure the safety of all drivers, races on the Main Track are split into three age categories (Under 12, Ages 12-15, Ages 16+) with appropriate speed limits in each category. Karts are controlled wirelessly in real-time by our team to ensure the safety of all racers.

Massive all-weather track

Our 410m track is one of the largest go-karting tracks in Sydney. With a variety of technical turns and wide strips, our track feels like the real deal. Our circuit caters for racers of all levels to ensure safe, family-friendly fun. Come rain, hail or shine, our all-weather venue is always open for a good time.

Your safety is our priority

At Hyper Karting we strongly support and uphold Australia’s strict rules and regulations to ensure the safety of all patrons. Engineered with safety at the forefront, our electric go-karts are equipped to reduce the opportunity for injuries in case of a collision. Our trained staff also conduct safety briefings and acutely observe any hazardous driving addressing any dangerous behaviour amongst our customers. All Drivers are required to wear helmets, seatbelts and closed-in shoes. Those under 18 must be accompanied by a parent or guardian who can sign the race registration waiver prior to racing. Ensure you look at the rest of our extensive safety precautions and track rules before you book your go karting or Virtual Reality gaming experience.

Free-roam Virtual Reality

Immerse yourself in a new world of excitement and adventure with our state-of-the-art Virtual Reality arena. Feel the adrenaline rush as you make your way through futuristic worlds, teaming up with your friends or facing-off against them for the win. The newest Virtual Reality in Sydney, Hyper Reality provides a truly immersive experience with VR games such as Zombies, Battle Royale, Team Deathmatch, Archery & Kitchen Panic!
